taskbody.prereq: An included module can be loaded at runtime either in a synchronized or de-synchronized way. The following steps assume that you have opened in the Page Editor, a page or a module that contains a least one inclusion of a stand-alone or container module.

step.cmd: Select the widget Include that includes the module for which you want to change the loading mode.
In the Properties view, activate the General tab and change the value of the property Loading Mode
